backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to related frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of multiple frontend source files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables and base theming for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML shell loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/components/BrandHeader.tsx: Header showing the Pegasus logo, brand name, and tagline with premium styling.
frontend/src/config/pegasus.ts: Central configuration for categories, company info, catalogue settings, and WhatsApp message helpers.
frontend/src/features/guided-flow/Catego: Interactive grid of category selection cards with icons and hover effects.
frontend/src/features/guided-flow/ChatMe: Renders animated chat message bubbles for system and user messages.
frontend/src/features/guided-flow/CTABut: CTA component providing WhatsApp contact and catalogue actions with red‑themed styling.
frontend/src/features/guided-flow/Guided: Main guided‑flow controller rendering messages, quick replies, categories, CTAs, and restart logic.
frontend/src/features/guided-flow/QuickR: Renders a list of quick-reply buttons and triggers onSelect with each reply's value and label. Provides basic styling and optional descriptions.
Defines TypeScript types for guided flow steps, messages, quick replies, and overall flow state. Centralizes step IDs and shared interfaces.
frontend/src/features/guided-flow/useGui: Implements guided flow state management, step transitions, and message creation logic. Contains the step configuration and answer-handling flow.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on the user's Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes. Wraps react-query for actor retrieval.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, login handling, identity persistence, and AuthClient setup. Exposes state and helpers for authentication flow.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Thin wrapper exposing the actor and fetching status from useActor. Placeholder for future backend queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and custom CSS variables for theme colors and layout, supporting both light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider, then mounts App. Loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage layout with branding, the guided flow card, and a footer. Acts as the main UI entry point for the guided flow.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, color tokens, fonts, shadows, animations, and plugin usage. Enables class-based dark mode and custom design tokens.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata, design constraints, and a list of existing features for a guided, chat-led B2B gifting website with a red Pegasus brand style.
